HOME.TITLE: Welcome to Cofat
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Digital Recruitment Platform for Logical Reasoning Tests

HERO.HEADLINE: Welcome to our psychometric testing platform
HERO.PARAGRAPH1: We are delighted to welcome you to this space where we assess and identify talents who will help shape the future of our company.
HERO.PARAGRAPH2: At our group, excellence is our standard, and we believe that every candidate has the potential to thrive within our dynamic team.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.TEXT1: At COFAT, excellence is our standard. We are a dynamic group specializing in the manufacturing of wiring and electrical harnesses for the automotive industry, deeply believing in the potential of every candidate.
ABOUT.TEXT2: Our recruitment process aims to identify talents who will thrive within our team and contribute to our collective success.
ABOUT.TEXT3: We value the harmonious match between candidate profiles and job positions, creating opportunities for mutual growth.

ABOUT3.INFO: We encourage you to approach these tests with confidence, knowing that your performance will play a key role in the recruitment process.
ABOUT3.DESCRIPTION: Your participation is highly valued, and we are committed to ensuring a smooth and secure evaluation process.
ABOUT3.THANK_YOU: We thank you for your participation and wish you the best of luck in these evaluations.

STEP1.TITLE: Registration
STEP1.DESC: Create your profile and access the tests

STEP2.TITLE: Psychometric Tests
STEP2.DESC: Evaluate your skills and suitability for the position

STATISTICS.SECURITY_NOTE: with easy access and secure data confidentiality.

MAP_SECTION.TITLE: Find Us Easily
MAP_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: To facilitate your visit on the day of the interview, consult the interactive map below which will guide you directly to our premises.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: For any questions or information, you can contact us through this form or directly at:
CONTACT.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Name must be at least 2 characters
CONTACT.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
CONTACT.MESSAGE_MIN_LENGTH: Message must be at least 10 characters
CONTACT.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_NOTE: Your information is secure and will only be used to respond to your inquiry.

FOOTER.COMPANY_DESCRIPTION: Your trusted partner for recruiting exceptional talent that drives business growth and innovation
FOOTER.MISSION_TEXT: We help organizations find and nurture top talent through our innovative assessment tools and expert recruitment process.
FOOTER.CONNECT_TEXT: Follow us on social media to stay updated with careers and recruitment insights
FOOTER.COPYRIGHT: Â© 2025 COFAT Tunis. All rights reserved.
